LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Buildings.Label: Check for roofs while deconstructing buildings?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Buildings.Tooltip: The base functionality of the mod, turn this and 'Check for roofs while mining' off to disable the mod.
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.CancelThick.Label: Cancel orders on thick roofs?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.CancelThick.Tooltip: If true, orders that will cause a mountain roof to collapse will be cancelled, and a warning message shown. Not recommended to turn off. Ignored if 'Remove thick roofs' is true.
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Mining.Label: Check for roofs while mining?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Mining.Tooltip: Whether or not to extend the functionality to mining.
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Thick.Label: Remove thick roofs?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Thick.Tooltip: Can pawns remove thick roofs? Note: This will be true if a mod that allows this is installed, however it does not require one.
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.ThickResearch.Label: Research for removing thick roofs
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.ThickResearch.Tooltip: Research project to act as a prereq for removing thick roofs, will be automatically set if 'Extended Roofing' or 'Raise the Roof' are installed. Requires 'Remove Thick Roofs' to be true.
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.NonColonists.Label: Enable for non-colonists?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.NonColonists.Tooltip: Allow pawns other than your colonists and animals to use run the checks?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Animals.Label: Enable for animals?
LanguageData.SmartDeconstruct.Animals.Tooltip: Allow animals to run these checks? If false, animals will collapse roofs on themselves as in vanilla
